verbose_text: TGF-beta may be important for the differentiation of Th cells into a regulatory Th or/and Th17 subtype, and may control the amplitude of an inflammatory response (Treg) and/or induce inflammation (Th17) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: TGF-beta may be important for the differentiation of Th cells into a regulatory Th or/and Th17 subtype, and may control the amplitude of an inflammatory response (Treg) and/or induce inflammation
